name: Eversion
summary: Eversion is a short platform game for Microsoft Windows by Zaratustra Productions. It features a small flower-like protagonist named Zee Tee,[1] who is on a quest to rescue a princess named Nehema, collecting gems along the way, much in the plot-style of early Mario games. Each level consists of a set of parallel realities, each of which features different hazards, a unique artistic style, and a distinctive soundtrack. By using Zee Tee's ability to "evert" from one reality to another, the player can navigate him through obstacles to reach his goal.
info:
• 中文名: 超级小花
  • 游戏类型: Platformer, Horror
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2008年12月29日
  • 开发商: Zaratustra Productions
